DOC.brief_summary: This 10 year follow-up investigation patient underwent total hip arthroplasty cement Bimetric stem .
DOC.brief_title: Bimetric-10 : Investigation Patients Who Have Underwent Total Hip Arthroplasty With Cemented Bi-Metric Stem
